chapters.title: Chapter 11: Ideas of Importance
chapters.info: Cenn Buie, p. 272 (308)—Knarled man from Emond's Field with a raspy voice. He is the local thatcher, and sits on the Village Council. He always produced conflict with others, especially the Women's Circle. Rand used his name as a flag so Nynaeve would agree to speak to him despite his disguise as a beggar.
